question: Rajyavardhan Singh Rathore has appointed as the minister of ___________.
option1: Union Minister of Drinking Water and Sanitation.
option2: Union Minister of Commerce and Industry.
option3: Union Minister of Youth Affairs and Sports
answer: Union Minister of Youth Affairs and Sports
explanation: Rajyavardhan Singh Rathore has appointed as the country's Youth Affairs and Sports Minister. He has succeeded Vijay Goyal as the Sports Minister and is the first sportsperson to become the head of the Sports Ministry. He is the first Indian shooter to win an Olympic medal after his silver at the 2004 Athens Games.
